price: Allah, O’ndan başka (hak) bir ilah yoktur. O halde müminler yalnız Allah’a tevekkül etsinler.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
